programme.title: Fright Knight - Episode 105
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds "The Book of Fear." It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her "knighmarish" power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest - as they fight off the Whipperella - that they we find out Aaron's true fear - the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Emma's Dilemma - Episode 5
programme.desc: When Stephanie becomes obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in a float building contest and accidentally disregards Emma's ideas and design, Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to get revenge on Stephanie. When the girls enter a float-building contest, Emma is especially excited to share her design idea for the float. But no one is listening to her, especially Stephanie, who's become obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in the contest. Emma finally does find someone who appreciates her design... Tanya! Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to build the float design. But is Tanya just using Emma to get revenge on Stephanie?

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: The Golden Castle - Episode 106
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie "Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle" he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: "The Golden Castle." While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for "The Golden Castle" and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a "script." The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight...Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: Friends Of The Jungle - Episode 6
programme.desc: When Olivia's Aunt Sophie is getting married and the groom has gone missing in the jungle, the girls fly out to the jungle in secret to try to find him in time for the wedding. The girls are super excited to be planning a wedding for Olivia's Aunt Sophie. There's just one little problem: Olivia learns that the groom has gone missing in the jungle while working at an animal rescue station! Not wanting to worry her aunt, Olivia, Stephanie and Mia secretly fly to the jungle to try and find the groom, Henry, rescuing a few animals along the way. Too bad Emma and Andrea couldn't keep the secret back in Heartlake City. Now, Sophie, Emma and Andrea join the others in the jungle to try and find Henry before the rapidly approaching wedding date!

programme.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement - Episode 107
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something...one of the Magic Books! It's "The Book of Deception." They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: Andrea's Big Moment - Episode 7
programme.desc: When famous pop star Livi comes to Heartlake City to judge a talent show, our five friends Olivia, Mia, Andrea, Emma and Stephanie all decide to enter - and one of them, in particular, really wants to win but faces some serious challenge from an old rival. A talent show has come to Heartlake City and all the girls enter the talent competition hoping to impress the judges, especially their idol, pop star Chloe. No one wants a shot at stardom more than Andrea, which is why the other girls are surprised when she doesn't show up to practice before the first round of the competition. Very nearly eliminated prior to the big show, Andrea panics and throws herself into an intense practice-training mode, even shutting her friends out when they're trying to help her with her performance. Just moments before her live TV debut, Andrea realizes she's missing a key element to her act. Can she pull it off without her friends? And are the other girls willing to help after being pushed away?

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win "The Blade Cup" where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: The Black Knight - Episode 108
programme.desc: It seems the NEXO-Knights are attacking villages throughout the realm! But why? A mysterious Black Knight appears to defend the cities from the rogue NEXO-villains! Jestro, happy he has the REAL Book of Deception, uses it to create bad versions of the NEXO-Knights. The "fake" knights then attack villages and hamlets. When the real NEXO-Knights arrive, they're booed and pelted with food. Why does everyone hate them? To make matters more confusing, a giant Mech Suit in black - The BLACK KNIGHT - appears to defend the kingdom's villages from the fake knights. The Black Knight ends up being very powerful and throws Jestro and his fake knights for a loop. He's cool and mysterious. But when the fake Knights get the better of him, the REAL NEXO-Knights appear to fend them off and learn their deceptive secret. The Knights save the Black Knight and they open him up to find...young ROBIN! (He used a deep, deceptive voice.) The Knights realize that Robin has potential. But maybe he still has some learning to do.

programme.title: Kate's Island - Episode 8
programme.desc: The five friends leave for science camp that takes place on an island and during the trip, they meet the stand-offish Kate - but they soon realize that there's more to her than meets the eyes and that you shouldn't judge the book by its cover. No one is more excited than Olivia about science camp at a beautiful rocky offshore island with a lighthouse. But Olivia quickly gets off on the wrong foot with a mysterious girl named Kate who seems obsessed with a medallion necklace and the island's rumored history of pirates and treasure. Even worse for Olivia, Kate seems to be growing extra chummy with Mia, even sneaking around the island with her late at night. With the help of Stephanie, Emma and Andrea, Olivia is determined to get to the bottom of the girls' secret friendship and find out once and for all what they're searching for on the island, but they better not let Mrs. Stevens catch them out of their cabin past curfew.

programme.title: The Green Ninja
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes inside the unstable Fire Temple that is built on a volcano.

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness - Episode 109
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap...is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: "The Book of Destruction." With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous, but Aaron says he must take the risk to gather the Knights and save Knighton.

programme.title: The Grand Hotel - Episode 9
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression - but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon - but can they trust him?

programme.title: The Might And The Magic - Episode 110
programme.desc: Aaron races across the kingdom to gather the NEXO-Knights as Jestro and his Destructive Monsters attack the King's Castle. The Knights must get back to the capitol in time, or Jestro will rule the kingdom! Jestro, while still attacking the King's Castle, has second thoughts until the Book of Monsters orders the mad jester to feed him another magic book he's found (and has been saving.) It's the powerful "Book of Revenge!" Now, combining the powers of Revenge and Destruction, Jestro and his monsters will get their vengeance on King Halbert and the Kingdom of Knighton. Jestro and his monsters lay siege...will they destroy the castle?! Meanwhile, Aaron races across the Kingdom gathering the NEXO-Knights one at a time. As each Knight rejoins the group, they become a more and more powerful team. They even get Robin to join them as the Black Knight in his repaired power suit. Our Knights arrive, finally regrouped, fight off Jestro, save the castle and the King. It's a glorious victory! The King is so pleased after seeing how the brave NEXO-Knights saved his kingdom, he allows Macy to join them as an official NEXO-Knight.

programme.title: The Rise Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: The ninja haste to the lost city of Ouroboros to try to stop Pythor from awaking The Great Devourer but it is a race against time.

programme.title: Back To School - Episode 201
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro - in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way - they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go "back to school" to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much "fish out of water" at the academy, even with the "cool kids" - Robin and Ava - showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and these kids are good (so good, they initially kick the lazy, know-it-all Knight's butts!) Their old principal, the ever-ornery Headmaster Brickland, sets them straight: they're all still slackers, and they better get their acts together (especially Lance!) The Knights take shifts as "library helpers" much to the delight of the old squirebot librarian, MARGE. They're convinced Jestro is after a book...isn't he always after a book? When Jestro attacks, the Knights help organize the students and there's a big fight in the Academy Library versus Jestro and his Monsters. They drive Jestro off without letting him steal any books! Victory! But as Jestro leaves, we see him holding what the Book of Monsters really wanted: a snow globe with a castle in it that was sitting on the librarian's desk. In the Lava Lands, Jestro throws the snow globe into a volcano and it frees the massive Castle of Monstrux from its snowy magic prison

programme.title: Getting The Message - Episode 11
programme.desc: As the Friends enjoy Heartlake Amusement Park, Emma types a text to Mia, but sends it to Matthew by mistake a text that could be mega-embarrassing for Emma! As her BFF's, the Friends race to find Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they must brave space rides, dunking booths and worse: the boys locker room! What's more frightening than a roller coaster? More twisted than a funhouse mirror? A text gone wrong! The Friends' fun day at Heartlake Amusement Park turns into a frantic race against time when Emma discovers that her innocent text to Mia was sent to Matthew by mistake -- a text that accidentally sounds like a pledge of Emma's undying love for Matthew! Mega-embarrassing! As Emma's BFF's, the Friends must scramble to retrieve Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they need to brave space rides, dunking booths, an angry brute and worse - the boys locker room!

programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: Greed Is Good? - Episode 202
programme.desc: When Jestro uses the Book of Greed to rob Auremville of its riches, he also gets Lance's parents as prisoners and these demanding rich folks are too much for even monsters to handle. Jestro's not sure what to do with his new castle in the Lava Lands. "Every castle needs a big chamber filled with treasure" says the Book of Monsters so they've got to go out looting! The BOM convinces Jestro to call forth GENERAL MAGMAR, and Jestro appoints him as "general manager" of "castle operations," much to Magmar's dismay. Meanwhile, Jestro and the BOM find the BOOK OF GREED. This will allow them to make greedy, rapacious monsters that will bring them all the treasure they want to fill their castle! They'll head to the richest town in the realm - AUREMVILLE! Meanwhile, in Auremville, the NEXO-Knights arrive for a huge "Gold is Good" ball at Lance's house. When the Monsters finally arrive in Auremville, a battle breaks out and the greedy monsters make off with everything...including Lance's parents, Goldie and Cuthbert Richmond who are clad in the finest golden garments and so look valuable! Lance will now be forced to live...poor. The Knights have to get his parents back. Meanwhile, his parents - Cuthbert and Goldie Richmond -think their imprisonment in Jestro's gold-filled castle is a "spa holiday" with the worst service. They order Magmar and the monsters around like servants and drive them all crazy. The Knights pile into the Fortrex and head for the Lava Lands, formulating a plan along the way to free Lance's parents. In a village half-way to Jestro's Castle, the Knights run into...Jestro and his monsters headed the other way with Lance's parents and all the gold they've stolen. There's a big fight, until they realize they might have the same goal and decide to deal. The BOM wants to give them back all the gold and Lance's parents. Lance says "No deal." "We'll take the gold, you can keep my parents." It's a weird and comical stand-off. Finally, Clay convinces Lance he has to take his parents back even if they don't always get along (and, it's the only way to get the gold back.)

programme.title: Darkness Shall Rise
programme.desc: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers. With the Devourer destroyed, Ninjago is saved and the rebuilding effort begins. Without their Golden Weapons, the Ninja are stripped of their elemental powers. And with their flying ship 'The Destiny's Bounty' destroyed, the Ninja are forced to find a new home in the city. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon resurfaces and gains control of the Serpentine as well as transforms the Bounty's wreckage to become 'The Black Bounty'. The Ninja will battle Scales and discover evil has begun to resurface in Ninjago, while Lord Garmadon will successfully forge the Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

programme.title: Close To Death
programme.desc: One of the oddest natural adaptations is super-deep sleep. These near-death experiences feature animals temporarily stopping their hearts and brains others can hibernate for months at a time while some can freeze themselves, employing a natural anti-freeze to keep their cells intact. But as we explore this natural time travel, we also discover that this lifestyle is not without risks...

Pam Grier co-stars in director Eddie Romero's "homage" to THE ISLAND OF DR. MOREAU.

programme.title: Black Christmas

programme.title: Carnival Of Souls

programme.title: House On Haunted Hill

programme.title: Vamps
programme.desc: Two socialite vampires in New York City (Krysten Ritter of TV's DON'T TRUST THE B*** and Alicia Silverstone of CLUELESS) fall in love while being pursued by vampire hunters.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Charlie is out of jail and on the make with a plan for the heist of the century. Aided by top criminal mastermind Mr. Bridger, Charlie sets off with a team of villains and to lift $4,000,000 from under the noses of the Turin Polizei.

programme.title: Detective Story
programme.desc: Kirk Douglas stars as the rigid detective whose personal code has become twisted from dealing with too many criminals. Eleanor Parker is his wife, tormented by a guilty secret.

programme.title: That Touch of Mink
programme.desc: Love arrives with a splash when a handsome and eligible tycoon and a beautiful working woman meet over a curbside mud puddle. He’s enchanted by her small town ways, she’s captivated by his romantic, debonair manner.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A famous cat burglar who has retired to the Riviera catches a thief imitating his old style.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Charlie is out of jail and on the make with a plan for the heist of the century. Aided by top criminal mastermind Mr. Bridger, Charlie sets off with a team of villains and to lift $4,000,000 from under the noses of the Turin Polizei.

programme.title: A Smile as Big as the Moon
programme.desc: A special-education teacher is determined to make sure his students get a chance to attend space camp. Overcoming unbelievable odds, he achieves amazing results. Stars John Corbett and Jessy Schram.

programme.title: Redwood Curtain
programme.desc: A story of an Amer-Asian girl, with the reluctant approval of her adoptive parents, seeks her natural father in the redwood forests of Northern California. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Breathing Lessons
programme.desc: A mature couple, one grounded and realistic and the other flighty and inspired, get lost on a trip that becomes a crazy adventure of twists, turns, shocks and surprises rekindling memories, love and life.

programme.title: Mr. Hockey: The Gordie Howe Story
programme.desc: The story of Gordie Howe's famed return to hockey at age 45, playing professionally alongside his 18- and 19-year-old sons, a comeback that brought his family together and remains one of the most legendary in hockey history.

programme.title: Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith
programme.desc: The story follows the spiritual journeys of three men: a suburban rabbi, an inner-city pastor, and an author. Stars Bradley Whitford, Laurence Fishburne, and Martin Landau. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Plainsong
programme.desc: Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

programme.title: The Task
programme.desc: A group of reality show contestants must survive the night in a haunted jail.

programme.title: Trucks
programme.desc: A truck stop becomes the scene of a hellish nightmare as the vehicles come to life and go on a killing spree.

programme.title: Shadow People
programme.desc: In the 70's, patients reported seeing shadowy intruders and then died asleep. Now, there's a new outbreak.

programme.title: Mr. Jones
programme.desc: A young couple is trapped in a labyrinth of terror when they intrude on their elusive neighbor’s property.

programme.title: The Curse of Downers Grove
programme.desc: A town with a dark secret is killing high school seniors. As graduation nears, Chrissie is certain she's next.

programme.title: Boa vs. Python
programme.desc: After a genetically altered python escapes, a scientist is enlisted to help kill it by releasing one his giant boa constrictors.

programme.title: Ginger Snaps
programme.desc: Death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their straight-laced suburb, must deal with the tragic consequences of a werewolf bite in this chilling coming-of-age drama.

programme.title: Howl
programme.desc: Passengers on a train are attacked by a vicious creature out of folklore and must band together to survive.

programme.title: Crocodile
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a boat trip - but their joyful weekend turns into horror when a giant killer crocodile, searching for its stolen eggs, picks off anyone who gets in its way.

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: When five teens discover a machine that can send them back in time, the possibilities seem endless. But by changing the past, they have threatened the future of our world. Can they undo the damage they have unleashed before it’s too late?

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Jason Statham stars as a tough cop who's dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers. Also featuring Paddy Considine and Aidan Gillen.

programme.title: Firepower
programme.desc: Two undercover cops risk it all by going deep inside a federally sanctioned haven of gambling, prostitution, drugs and violence, to bring down a psychotic criminal mastermind.

programme.title: Post Impact
programme.desc: After a meteor strike starts a new ice age, a group of survivors try to find a device that could give mankind new hope. Featuring Dean Cain and Bettina Zimmermann.

programme.title: The Assassin's Code
programme.desc: A rookie detective, son of a late disgraced cop, works to solve his first major case while under the watchful eye of a ghost-like assassin.

programme.title: Johnny Was
programme.desc: "Johnny Was" follows former Irish thug Johnny Doyle as he navigates questions of race and morality in an attempt to avoid all-out war with West Indian Yardies in a Brixton safehouse.

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: When a young basketball player becomes entangled with drug dealers, he turns to an ex-cop and former private eye. Starring Ice-T, Gary Busey, Fred Williamson and Jim Brown.

programme.title: Elder
programme.desc: A Mormon missionary finds his world turned upside down when he falls in love with a handsome, Italian Communist. With original 8mm film Tom Clark recounts a love story on the coast of Italy.

programme.title: Bodega De Edgar
programme.desc: The courageous story of Edgar Torres immigrating to the US illegally with his father in the 80’s, becoming a wine expert and starting a winery in Paso Robles, CA to give his children a better future.

programme.title: Fine Lines
programme.desc: There is something far deeper that drives the world's most elite group of mountain adventurers to take life threatening risks while free climbing. At times brutally honest, other times pensive, these 20 legends of the vertical world share stories that reveal the triumph of the human spirit.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: Interviews and never-before-seen footage highlight the incredible life of astronaut Neil Armstrong -- from his near-death experiences as a fighter pilot and test pilot to his historic Apollo 11 mission as the first man on the moon.

programme.title: Welcome to Ouzville
programme.desc: Born in in the neighborhood of Ouzai, Ayad Nasser has a vision to revitalize a part of the city which was cut off by the Lebanese state after it became a safe haven for gangs. He brings in a team of street artists to colorfully paint the buildings and volunteers to clean up the neglected streets, so that his hometown could become a place to build dreams.

programme.title: Meet the Patels
programme.desc: In this real-life "My Big Fat Greek Wedding,” an Indian-American man gets help from his parents and extended family so he can start looking for a wife the traditional Indian way.

programme.title: Banking on Bitcoin
programme.desc: An ideological battle is underway between fringe utopists, mainstream capitalists, the curious public and angry regulators over Bitcoin, the most disruptive invention since the internet. BANKING ON BITCOIN explores this revolutionary technology and the players who are defining how it will shape our lives.

programme.title: How to Get Away with Cheating
programme.desc: Although Professor Alex P. Keating and his wife Olivia's marriage has hit a bit of a dry spell, his professional life could not be better. Based on the success of his self help book, How To Get Away With Cheating, he is in immediate negotiations for his own television show ala Dr. Phil, and the women around the college campus where he teaches are all over him. Every thing changes when a casual fling with a sultry yet unstable woman named Fabrae, who appears out of nowhere, finds out that Professor Keating is actually happily married. Now she wants revenge, against him and everyone protecting him, including his wife.

programme.title: Her Happy Place
programme.desc: Tasha lost her job and her boyfriend. Even worse, she lost the love for herself. Her friend Felicia helps her time travel to find when she lost her self love hoping they can get it back.

programme.title: Valentine's Date
programme.desc: A couple desperate to get divorced must survive the craziest weekend of their lives to gain their freedom from each other.

programme.title: 81 Days
programme.desc: In a widely used internet world, often times friends, family and even married couples, have major infidelity suspicions because of the suspected cheaters use of it. Tish has had it with her husband Andrew and his Facebook surfing. He lies all the time about his so-called FEMALE FRIENDS that are on Facebook, so, Tish retaliates in the Godliest way one could ever image. 81 DAYS is based on true life social media cheating events that sadly happens to many of us, each and every day.

programme.title: Dark Seed
programme.desc: The ticking of her biological clock brings Emon, a hard-driving executive in line for a big promotion, to a decision not shared by her amiable husband Idreese in this intimate drama. A guilty secret buried in her past and an unspoken trauma lurking in his bring on a crisis, as the future of their seemingly perfect marriage hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Do's and Don'ts of Dating
programme.desc: Ladies' man Scott Hall thinks he has the dating game figured out. He has dating rules that he follows until he meets his match. Will she throw him off his game?

programme.title: The Baron And The Kid
programme.desc: Johnny Cash, Greg Webb, Tracy Pollan William “The Baron” Addington (Johnny Cash) is a former pool pro whose lifetime of boozing has cost him his career and family. In an attempt to straighten out his life, he quits drinking and plays pool only for charity.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 1

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan, Patrick Stewart, Gabrielle Anwar, Omar Gooding, Jason Durr, Danielle Calvert, Roy Marsden Escaping from a Confederate prison camp by balloon, five survivors land on an uncharted island in the Pacific. Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.

programme.title: The KAOS Brief
programme.desc: Top secret footage reveals the fates of four teens who vanish during a trip to the mountains.

programme.title: Passing Through
programme.desc: For decades, the poor and dispossessed have been herded and confined to Skid Row. In Passing Through, the seemingly lost find a new sense of community. Directed by 2-time winner and 13-time nominee DGA Director of the Year, Leslie Dektor.

programme.title: Adventures in Public School
programme.desc: A socially awkward home-schooled kid forces his way into public-school when he falls for the popular one-legged girl (Siobhan Williams). Much to his mother's (Judy Greer) chagrin, he gets a crash course in sex, drugs, and social mayhem.

programme.title: MakeSHIFT
programme.desc: For decades, the advertising industry remained lucrative, cushy and largely unchanged. Then the Internet happeneddisrupting everything. make|SHIFT profiles those who survived and thrived in the face of massive technological change.

programme.title: From Liberty to Captivity
programme.desc: From Liberty to Captivity examines how Pennsylvania went from representing the fight for freedom, to becoming a state where modern-day slavery is threatening liberty and justice for all, while presenting the very real hope for victory.
